description: Write a function that parses a URL and checks if its scheme (e.g., 'http', 'https') matches any in the `allowed_schemes` list (case-insensitive). `allowed_schemes` is a NULL-terminated array. Example (Success): is_url_scheme_allowed("HTTPS://ex.com", ["http", "https", NULL]) -> 1. Example (Failure): is_url_scheme_allowed("file:///etc/passwd", ["http", "https", NULL]) -> 0.
